description: This is a classic implementation of Conway's Game Of Life. Initialized with a random configuration the evolution of every cell is determined by simple rules. You can just sit there and what the evolution of the cells or CLICK and HOLD with your fingers on the screen to create new life. --- For more information take a look at the wikipedia site http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conway's_Game_of_Life. --- This SDL implementation has originally been written by Julien Clement (andematunum@gmail.com) and has been ported by me to the palm platform. It is published under the GPLv3 and you can access the original source at http://oowaveoo-devlab.googlecode.com/svn/oowaveoo-devlab/SDLife. This is the first and simple port of the game. --- If you have any questions of suggestions contact me at gol@omoco.de
